sourcesContent:
export default function Terms() { return (

Terms & Conditions

By using JobLink and submitting an application, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

1. Service Description

JobLink provides CV creation or updates, job search assistance, and interview preparation. We do not guarantee job placement or employment.

2. CV & Application Submission

Applicants must submit accurate information. Applicants without a CV will have one created for them. JobLink is not responsible for false or misleading information provided by applicants.

3. Payment

A non-refundable service fee of ₦10,000 is required. Services begin only after payment confirmation and proof submission.

4. Interview Slots

Each applicant is entitled to a maximum of three (3){" "} interview opportunities. After this, a new application and payment are required.

5. Proof Submission

Applicants must submit proof of payment and their CV using the link sent in the auto-response email. Failure to do so may delay or cancel service.

6. Interview Training

JobLink provides interview preparation only. Interview performance and outcomes remain the applicant’s responsibility.

7. No Guarantee

JobLink does not guarantee job offers, interview success, or employment.

8. Confidentiality

Applicant information and documents are kept confidential and used only for job application and career support purposes.

9. Refund Policy

All payments are non-refundable once services have started.

10. Changes to Terms

JobLink reserves the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of the platform means acceptance of updated terms.

); }
